EmailTemplate.name: Broker Payment Not Cleared S&M Head
EmailTemplate.subject: Broker Payment Not Cleared
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi S&M Head User,
The brokerage invoice of {!CP} against Booking {!Name} for {!Unit} in {!Project} was submitted to Accounts on {!Date}, but the payment is still pending. Please request the Accounts Team to release the payment at the earliest.
Thank You, Dynamix
